website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a range of delicious and nutritious ingredients, such as sunflower seeds, peanuts, and peas, so even the pickiest hamsters and gerbils will get the nutrition they need.
pros: Corn, ground corn, wheat, and sunflower seeds are the first 4 ingredients
High protein diet for healthy skin and coat
Hamsters and gerbils love the variety of flavors
cons: The varied mix of foods is a treat, but hamsters and gerbils don’t need the artificial colorings

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Fed this to my hamsters, several days later they both died. They were perfectly fine until I gave them this. Stay away from it. If I could give it no stars I would. Read the 1 star comments. Wish I did before I bought it and gave it to them. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, but I was immediately disappointed. It's the only food I have to feed my hamsters now, but I hate doing so. Product came with a lot of dust and dried out husks of sticks. There were also several little spikey balls that were about a centimeter long that I had to take out while sifting the dust. I worry about what would have happened if I put them in my dwarf hamsters bowl. Even the product I felt ok giving them is really dull and artificial looking. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Rori

customer_reviews.title: Full of bugs
customer_reviews.text: I opened this bag of food about a month after it was delivered and there were webs and live moths inside. I've used this food before for my 9 gerbils and been very satisfied; it's one of the few gerbil food products you can buy in bulk at a good savings. I guess the lesson here is to open the product right away to make sure it isn't infested even if you don't need to use it right away. The window for returning the item had passed by the time I realized the problem so there's no way to receive credit for the damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Nagy

customer_reviews.title: I love how much product I get when I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this hamster food. For one, I love how much product I get when I purchased this. I had been giving it to my hamsters for a long time. However, over time I had learned this type of hamster food has a lot of seeds and corn which are fatty for a hamster's daily diet. If you get this for your hamster, I would reccomend mixing it which a different type of food and only giving them a little of this one. My hamsters loved this product, but overall I would rather stick to healthier chocies for my pets as their main diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They like it.
customer_reviews.text: Hamster trail mix. It's got a little bit of this and little bit of that and our hamster loves it. She can choose what she wants to eat now and later. We give her this and some Oxbow hamster feed along with some fresh vegetable and fruit. She loves it. The five pound bag will last for awhile since we supplement her diet with other offerings suitable for her. We do notice that she likes to take different items from her bowl and hide them in different parts of the tank. She later "forages" and eats them when she wants.
customer_reviews.author: Jcall55

customer_reviews.title: Way too many seeds
customer_reviews.text: Is it natural to have so many sunflower seeds? I read that sunflower seeds are more of a treat for hamsters, so i should not feed more then 4 or 5 per day, but every time I go for a handful of food, there is like a gazilion seeds! I have to hand pick them out so i won't over feed my dwarf hamster with it. Otherwise the price is very cheap for the amount you get, just please, limit the seeds, if anything you can even lower the weight of the bag, just don't put too many seeds, irritated me every time when i have to refill the bowl
customer_reviews.author: Wei M.

customer_reviews.title: I’m literally in tears writing this review My hamsters DIED ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m literally in tears writing this review My hamsters DIED after eating this It says it’s for all hamster and I fed my four weeks old baby hamsters with this. Two of them are died now. On the way to emergency vet once I discovered they’re not ok.. Bye my two babies. I’m sorry I didn’t treat you well. BE VERY CAREFUL
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good mix. Too many sunflower seeds.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great food mix for a hamster. He has been very healthy and has lots of energy. His coat is also really nice and soft. This bag is a TON of food for a hammie. 1 star does come off though because it is LOADED with sunflower seeds. And I admit our little guys loves his sunflower seeds but they are just too high in fat to feed a hamster a steady diet of them. Between 2-4 a week at most to balance out his weight and indulgence. If you were to just put a scoop on his bowl it would put 10 to 12 sunflower seeds a day. Way to much but overall a nice mix
customer_reviews.author: sz28

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a plain bulk bag with a tag. I've never had any moths or insect problema and I feed my hamsters and feeder mice this blend mixed with some other goodies. Definitely the best value for your dollar - local stores want $10+ for less than 5lb! My creatures all seem to like it and I've had no major health concerns or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Postle

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: So far loving this food. Love that it is healthy for my hamster as well as promotes a heathly digestive system and promotes the hamsters to chew more than other foods. As a hamster mom, I want to be sure he’s getting the healthiest diet and this one really stood out to me compared to other brands and kinds of food. The first night I fed him this, his bowl was empty by morning. So hopefully that means he’s enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Tsjewsi

customer_reviews.title: Hamster likes it
customer_reviews.text: My hamster seems to like this food and there haven't been any adverse effects besides that it turns her poop green... probably the coloring of some of the pieces of food. She seems fine and still eats her food. I haven't seen any other reviews saying this so I wanted to leave one in case anyone else experiences this.
customer_reviews.author: Ali P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging- will not reseal
customer_reviews.text: My gerbils like this food but the last two bags will not reseal because the sealing strip fell of. I am left wondering if it tastes stale to them!
customer_reviews.author: Jesusfreak

customer_reviews.title: It has a great variety of ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster is definitely a fan of this food. It has a great variety of ingredients, the corn kernels being the favorite. I had to deduct a star because the bottom of the bag had opened on the seam when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Engan

customer_reviews.title: Two Hamster Didn't Approve
customer_reviews.text: Our first hamster hated this stuff. Wouldn't touch it so we used a different brand until she passed away. We've had our new hamster for a few months now and she too doesn't like this product. She leave more than half of the contents untouched.
customer_reviews.author: faqby

customer_reviews.title: A good part of her diet.
customer_reviews.text: Hamster trail mix. It's got a little bit of this and little bit of that and our hamster loves it. She can choose what she wants to eat now and later. We give her this and some Oxbow hamster feed along with some fresh vegetable and fruit. She loves it. The five pound bag will last for awhile since we supplement her diet with other offerings suitable for her. We do notice that she likes to take different items from her bowl and hide them in different parts of the tank. She later "forages" and eats them when she wants.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Good for hamsters obviously
customer_reviews.text: My hamster been eating this for about 2 weeks and I haven’T seen anything irregular with his poops. So I’m thinking this food is fine for my hamster Puff. I just know that Kaytee brand is a good pet food brand for hamsters. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: Our hampster likes it and he has actually lost a little weight since he has been on it (he is terribly overweight) so I am not making any health claims here but Cookie is slimming down a bit since starting this food!
customer_reviews.author: PAsFab5

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!! This food killed my daughters hampster. ...
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!! This food killed my daughters hampster. She began peeing blood and quit drinking water after she ate some of the blue food.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Syrian hamster loves it
customer_reviews.text: The pet store warned me about the hamster picking out the things he likes and not getting the full benefit of all of the seeds and grains. Well, we started with a ground up food that is formed into pieces and eventually he got bored with that. My hamster loves digging through this mix and he eventually eats the majority of it.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Marsallo

customer_reviews.title: This bag of food was full of worms which we ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag of food was full of worms which we didn't notice until 3 weeks later when the worms had crawled all over my son's room - all over the bed and bedposts and ceiling!!! Our dwarf hamster had barely made a dent in the bag and we had to throw it away and debug the room!!! Will never buy again!!!! And my son is scared that there are worms in his bed still! The food must have been quite old and in an infested warehouse!!!
customer_reviews.author: steven p davison

customer_reviews.title: Hamster Food
customer_reviews.text: Prefer larger pellets because hamster moves food around, but gets the job done for the price. Hamster seems to eat the same just harder to track what she has left.
customer_reviews.author: SeldomReview

customer_reviews.title: Good for four hamsters
customer_reviews.text: Quite a lot of value for the price. We have four Syrian hamsters, and a bag lasts a long time. They seem to like this mix as they eat it all up. It comes in a plastic-canvas-y feed bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Hamster diet/food.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and delivered on time and in good condition via Prime. Turned our Hamsters' poo green. 4 Stars - not sure if green poop is good. Hamsters like it well enough and it contains plenty of seed and grain variety. Hamsters seem to be doing well on this diet/food. Very Pleased and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: HappyDad

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great quality
customer_reviews.text: Our little girl loves= all the treats, we love the health benefits and the great price. Way cheaper than the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: laryssa clark

customer_reviews.title: Turned my hamsters poop green
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of healthy stuff, not bulked out by oats! I started my hamster on the food his starter cage came with then switched to this stuff after about 2 weeks. After switching, right away I noticed it turned his poop bright green, but not to worry my vet said its totally fine and approved of the food! He seems to really like the stuff
customer_reviews.author: Mel S.

customer_reviews.title: Animals love it!! 😍
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 hamsters and 2 guinea pigs and one bag lasts over 3 months and they all love it except for the little tiny seeds.
customer_reviews.author: shara

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great buy for the money and might buy a different ...
customer_reviews.text: My Hammys were eating it all, but guess they are used to it by now and are becoming picky about what they eat out of it. Otherwise great buy for the money and might buy a different kind to mix with this one later on.
customer_reviews.author: ertigers

customer_reviews.title: They'll eat it
customer_reviews.text: My two gerbils like this food but don't love it. They pick out their favorites like sunflower seeds and corn. They don't care for the pellets much.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My gerbils love this
customer_reviews.text: My gerbils love this food! As soon as I fill up their food bowl with this they don't waste any time chowing down.
customer_reviews.author: malwarehunter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great mix at a great price. Some critter food mixes try to short you on the sunflower seeds, but not this one. All.of my hamsters favorites are in here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POISON. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS POISON! DO NOT BUY THIS!! Our gerbils (very much loved, sweet Christmas gift, and only pets we have) DIED WITHIN 2 WEEKS of starting this food. I SO WISH I had read reviews as this has happened to others. DISCONTINUE THIS CRAP. IT IS TOO SAD TO WATCH YOUR CHILDREN CRY BECAUSE OF CARELESS AMAZON SELLERS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Good for hamsters, bunnies or guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loves this stuff, BUT she only likes the sunflower seeds first then she will slowly eat everything else... I wish she wouldn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Karah G

customer_reviews.title: Porkchop approved!
customer_reviews.text: My hamster, Porkchop, loves it! The only negative I have to say is the resealable bag was ripped right at the corner of the seal so it didn’t actually keep the product closed and fresh. I just transferred it to a jar I was using for her food before. Not a deal breaker in my case.
customer_reviews.author: MandyP

customer_reviews.title: My hamster seems to love the selection of food
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other foods, but Kaytee's Forti Diet Pro Health Hamster Food is what I'm going to be sticking with. My hamster seems to love the selection of food. These bags usually last me about 2 months or so. The only downside, when I open the packaging it seems to rip in a way that makes the zip lock irrelevant. I'm currently storing it in a Tupperware container.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters love the blue and green pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great product this is my hamsters favorite food by far. And the cheapest place I can find it is amazon
customer_reviews.author: Emmykhart

customer_reviews.title: Price jumped ...not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: WAS a good value for the price. My mice and hamsters would not eat the big colored pieces . Even without eating them still good value. Now that the price jumped from $25 to $37... it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great. My hamster loves this stuff. It has everything good for him, amazing price, and a great amount.
customer_reviews.author: DRad

customer_reviews.title: Great Value And Perfect Size For Hamsters
customer_reviews.text: We have a short haired and a dwarf hamster. The pieces of this food are perfect for the dwarf hamster. He's able to eat it easier than the food I bought at Petco. Also the value on this bag is great! I spent $8 on a 2lb bag of food when we bought the hamsters, and this was $9.72 for 5lbs! Great value and I had it shipped Prime. The hamsters seem to be enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: sadiejane82

customer_reviews.title: My Gerbils absolutely love this food
customer_reviews.text: My Gerbils absolutely love this food. After reading some of the other reviews I decided to pick out the sunflower seeds from this mix at first. However, that took WAY too much time. Without the sunflower seeds my gerbils def trimmed up but I don't think I will take them out again due to time consumption. Overall, this is great gerbil food and I will continue to buy this for my two gerbils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hamster is still kicking....
customer_reviews.text: Our dwarf hamster is two years old and counting. So I would say this food is doing its job. She likes it and has exceeded the average life span.
customer_reviews.author: J. Presley

customer_reviews.title: When I got it I realized it was some weird blue green crunchy thing that made the hamster's poop blue green-it looks like they a
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because when I looked at the picture online I thought there were freeze dried green beans in it. When I got it I realized it was some weird blue green crunchy thing that made the hamster's poop blue green-it looks like they ate a smurf. I don't think I'd buy this one again although I see there's a different picture now so who know what you're going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Armes

customer_reviews.title: Good buy good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this food. It was packaged well and had the expiration date on the food. The bag is not resealable. It is a good buy for the price. This brand of food is very nutritious. I have feed it to my hamsters for four years.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: Not a permanent choice.
customer_reviews.text: My gerbils smell much worse with this feed. They used to be on Oxford brand, but this one has food coloring and their poop and pee smell much more acrid.
customer_reviews.author: Danii956

customer_reviews.title: It took a while for our hamster to take to ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for our hamster to take to this food. It is mostly small seeds. At first he only went for the sunflower seeds and left everything else but after 3 weeks he has finally begun to eat the grain squares and corn. To be honest though this reminds more of bird seed than hamster food. I trust the Kaytee brand but I think they fell short when making Kaytee Forti Diet Pro Health Food.
customer_reviews.author: abueday2

customer_reviews.title: Hammies love it
customer_reviews.text: We've used this food consistently for four years for two hamsters. It was recommended when we adopted our first hamster from the Humane society. We've seen no reason to use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Small Pets
customer_reviews.text: I like that this food is affordable and that I can get it on autoship (at a discount). My daughter forgets to tell me she's running low on critter food until she runs completely out. It looks like there's treats mixed into the food, and I like that I don't have to go out and buy separate treats for the 2 hamsters and 1 gerbil that we have. The pets seem to really like this food as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Came in 24 hours after I ran out of gerbil food
customer_reviews.author: kat avoa

customer_reviews.title: Good as a supplement food
customer_reviews.text: Good as a supplement food, but not as a main source of nutrition for my hamster. She picks out what she wants to eat and leaves the rest. I also feed her a pelleted Kaytee food as well that comes in a 5lb bag and she loves that.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My Syrian seems to be satisfied with this food. He's constantly digging through it to pick out his favourites. He is a little weird though, he doesn't eat the sunflower seeds! There is always a pile of sunflower seeds left behind. Supposedly though, eating too many of those is bad for hamsters, so I guess it's a good thing?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: like half body that much hair
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. The green stick come with a lot of artificial green color. My hamster's stools are so green that you can use them for painting. It may also making your hamster losing hair, a lot of hair, like half body that much hair. So, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: FENG G.

customer_reviews.title: There is a TEAR
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is that when it came in the package, there was a tear at the bottom and food were falling out. I got duct tape and taped it shut. Idk if this affected the food in anyway during the packaging and handling.
customer_reviews.author: TheLeeWind

customer_reviews.title: ... my hamster (Peanut) ate this food she seemed to like all of it
customer_reviews.text: When my hamster (Peanut) ate this food she seemed to like all of it. She ate the sunflower seeds alot she ate almos tall of them in two days!She looooooooooooves it. I will keep buying this food. When i take Peanut in the kitchen i put her in the food bag. She also eates her seeds in the bag.Peanut is haaaaaaappy when she eats kaities food.
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good stuff, but mixed with a blander bag of ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good stuff, but mixed with a blander bag of food so Milo the hamster wasn't getting so many fatty sunflower seeds. (there's a lot of those in there)
customer_reviews.author: Amber McQuillan

customer_reviews.title: Hammy Seems to Like It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our first hamster. She loves it. She seems to especially like the large seeds and dried veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good size, seems fresh, no bugs, prime ship.
customer_reviews.text: Nice formulas, nice mix of stuff, looks fresher than the cheap stuff I've been getting from wal mart. Five pounds so there's plenty for a few months or so depending on hamster or hamsters. Price was fair, ten bucks for five pounds with free prime shipping. Give it a try, I haven't noticed my hamster running for this food but he never doe's unless it's treats like crackers or bananas.
customer_reviews.author: Call me KID

customer_reviews.title: Great amount for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great amount for the price.. but my hamster won't really eat it.. not sure what's wrong with it, but if he won't eat it (he eats everything) I'm guessing there is something up with it...
customer_reviews.author: Kammerenna

customer_reviews.title: Hamster loves
customer_reviews.text: My hamster doesn't really like the normal pellets bits, but he loves everything else in the bag. Watching him crawl into the food bowl to munch on these is super adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Sindy Huang

customer_reviews.title: Good gerbil food
customer_reviews.text: Good seed-based gerbil food. My gerbils seem to like it and always pick out their favorite parts first. I mix this with a pellet based diet as I have heard too much seeds can cause weight issues (all the fat).
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Francis

customer_reviews.title: My hamsters don't like the larger colorful pieces in this food
customer_reviews.text: My hamsters don't like the larger colorful pieces in this food. They typically leave pellets/pellet-like pieces and only eat the natural seeds, so I was aware that they would probably do that with this food too. The seeds and kernels appeal to my hamsters though and look fresher than some bagged food.
customer_reviews.author: ALH12

customer_reviews.title: AVOID if allergic to PEANUTS!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure my hamster would love this food but BEWARE! It contains peanuts to which I am highly allergic. So if you have a peanut allergy in the house, AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Miley Alexander

customer_reviews.title: My Hamster seems to enjoy this mix more than other brands
customer_reviews.text: My Hamster seems to enjoy this mix more than other brands. There seems to be less "filler foods" and more nutrients in this bag. Will definitely continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Summer G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My guess it was good but I don't know because my hamster died BEFORE I could give him some.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Hamster food
customer_reviews.text: 4/5 because my hamster eats all the the pellets. Just a shame because of how many are in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hamster approved
customer_reviews.text: My 4 Roborovski Dwarf hamsters love this food. It seems like a really good, diverse blend. They do go for the seeds and crisps much more than they go after the protein pellets, but I think such is the case when rodents are given any mix like this (the healthiest stuff goes last). It's a good price for a big bag, and I'll continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hamster prefers this to Oxbow's stuff, which is almost impossible to get half the time, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ferret

customer_reviews.title: Lots of seeds
customer_reviews.text: Lots of seeds. Hamster doesn't seem to like as much as other mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, full of good stuff
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY food for hamsters. There's a LOT of the good stuff, minimal filler.
customer_reviews.author: Swriter

customer_reviews.title: Bag zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: The re-sealable zipper broke when I opened the bag for the first time. It's not sturdy so I had to transfer everything into a Ziplock bag to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Our hamster seems happy with this food and the variety within the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster seems happy with this food and the variety within the bag is nice. She likes the seeds and there are plenty in here.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Chewy, our hamster, loves this food and the variety in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My Critters say Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: My hamsters loved the seeds and the crackers in this formula mix. They ate the mix with no problem. I have bought this brand several times before and I will purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Hue

customer_reviews.title: bueno
customer_reviews.text: my gerbils love this food. just enough sunflowers and other yummy add-ins to make them happy but not fat. their coat looks healthier with this food and they seem to really enjoy this food. i like that its so healthy for them!
customer_reviews.author: midnighttoker9294

customer_reviews.title: amazing hamster food
customer_reviews.text: my hamster seems to really enjoy all the different variations of seeds .I have used this for my past hamster and now using it for my present hammy I will always order this type of hamster food when looking for especially with super fast {1 day} shipping.
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: Variety
customer_reviews.text: Good price, hamsters and mice seem to enjoy the different food. Although no rodent that I have ever had enjoyed the pellets. They will only eat them if I delay feeding them for a little bit. I think the pellets have more nutrients and I would hate for it to go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great food! Same quality as pet stores, only cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: One bag will last a Hamster for 2 years!! So cheap compared to petco!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Dixie loves it
customer_reviews.text: The hamster seems to love it and is happy. Happy hamster equals happy daughter which equals happy dad.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyBmore

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My gerbil loves it.... well he loves the sunflower seeds
customer_reviews.author: Lance Sternstein

customer_reviews.title: Good and you get ALOT of it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect diet for hamsters and gerbil's. My bunny likes to eat this stuff to.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Combo, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Dwarf hamsters here. They love the food, but don't eat the little pellets until everything else is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: My hamsters are liking the food! Especially the sunflower seeds. There seems to be a lot of them, which is perfect. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SKKE

customer_reviews.title: ... loves this food and I got it at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Our little hamster loves this food and I got it at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: texwards

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was the best food for our dwarf hamsters but I found out ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the best food for our dwarf hamsters but I found out that it has corn, which isn't too good for them. So I still use it, but I had to spend two hours picking out the corn. LOL That alone is a reason for the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain - Brother E - Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Robo Dwarf Hamster and the product is excellent. But he only eats the sunflower seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Jose N

customer_reviews.title: Good mix of treats
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the mix of food. My hamster doesn't like the small balls (?) & colored logs (not sure what these are made of)....
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my gerbil healthy as a horse. His poop ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my gerbil healthy as a horse. His poop is blue if he eats the little sticks that come with it, though. I guess the dye just doesn't digest at all.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: and buying in bulk is good on the wallet
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loves it, and buying in bulk is good on the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: megalodon

customer_reviews.title: Love this hamster food
customer_reviews.text: Love this hamster food. Its at such a great price it is much cheaper than PETCO, I'm so glad I checked the price and bought it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to any owners of hamsters most definitely !
customer_reviews.text: For one thing, Petco and Petsmart and smaller retail stores do not offer your approach to safe organic foods. I bought enough for two years! Keeping it in freezer to preserve freshness and quality, as needed....Thank you again, Kaytee distributors!
customer_reviews.author: Lyric

customer_reviews.title: Our 3 hamsters love this food
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 hamsters love this food! They are doing very well on it and waste very little! We just can't be the price in any of our local stores for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Skyz

customer_reviews.title: They were never hungry!!
customer_reviews.text: They dwarf hamsters loved this. Unfortunately so did some unwelcome mice so store it in an airtight container!
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Teddy bear hampster loves this food. Bag size lasts for at least 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Misty L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this as my hamsters love this. Only issue is their addiction to sunflower seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Naruto

customer_reviews.title: ... this to my gerbils and rat regularly and they like it pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my gerbils and rat regularly and they like it pretty well. As with all pet food, ​though, there is a lot of filler seeds that just get thrown out
customer_reviews.author: AKA_RATMOM

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this can last for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Can last you for a long time to feed the hamsters. money saver and time saver.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My hamster stopped eating here Oxbow and soon have been trying to find a way to get her to eat. She likes this food. So glad to have found her something! Hopefully she will fatten back up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Davis

customer_reviews.title: This food is far superior. They are eating much more than before
customer_reviews.text: When we brought our little hammies home, we purchased the bulk food that the pet store was using. This food is far superior. They are eating much more than before. This is good stuff for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster enjoys this bag over some others we purchased, but he always leaves the green pellets behind.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Gerbils seem to love everything in here except the green colored food. They might just be picky XD
customer_reviews.author: B. Steep

customer_reviews.title: great variety
customer_reviews.text: My gerbils love the variety in this. I've used it to make treats too by gluing the seeds with honey to popsicle sticks. Financially better than pets stores and fresher than what you find at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Morgeanna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent food but has peanuts in it and we can't have those in the house due to allergies
customer_reviews.author: Clairissa Granquist

product_meta.title: Kaytee Forti Diet Pro Health Hamster Food
product_meta.description: Size:3-Pound| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingKaytee Forti-Diet Pro Health Hamster and Gerbil food was developed by an animal nutritional expert to ensure you pet gets the proper nutrition. Forti Diet Pro Health contains probiotics and prebiotics to support digestive health. This food is rich in natural antioxidants for general health and immune support plus contains some larger, more crunchy pieces to support dental health through natural chewing activity. Kaytee understands that sharing your life with a small pet is not only enjoyable but very enriching. Kaytee shows our love by ensuring we provide your small pet with the best nutrition for a long and healthy life. With over 150 years of nutritional experience, it's no wonder why Kaytee is at the heart of every healthy feeding routine.
feature_bullets: Larger, Crunchy Pieces Supports Dental Health Through Natural Chewing Activity
Prebiotics And Probiotics To Support Digestive Health
A Nutritionally Complete Diet For Hamsters And Gerbils

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
